short_description: TDP002 Imperativ programmering: Terminal based sokoban
long_description: A terminal based sokoban game written in Python 3. The goal of sokoban is to push crates in a warehouse onto designated storage locations.

A portfolio containing all my projects, consisting av a presentation layer and a data layer. The presentation layer is implemented with Flask and fetches data from the data layer written in Python 3, which is then displayed using Jinja2 templates

A game written in C++, using objectoriented programming. You control Douglas, your character with the keyboard and attack enemies by walking into them. Killing enemies yields experiencepoints that eventually make you go up in level and deal more damage and gain more health.
